text_block_list.text: One day after training――

Good work, Trainer-san. I found a 
delicious tea, so I'll prepare it now.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Even if it was to recover fatigue from the previous race, 
the training felt so light that it was a little unsatisfying～.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text: Today, again, it ended before the sun had set……
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Fufuu, of course, I understand. So that I can 
win the next race, I need to properly rest…… right?
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
『It'll be too late once something happens』―― 
Trainer-san, I'm always grateful for your consideration♪
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text: (Ding dong ding……)

『Grass Wonder-san, the Student Council President is calling you. 
Please make your way to the student council room』
text_block_list.name: School Broadcast

text_block_list.text: Oh, what could that possibly be about……?
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, I have returned～.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
It seems that they wanted to request that I participate in the 
mock race they're holding at the school's orientation.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
For all those girls who dream of the Twinkle Series, 
to think they'd be watching me race, it's quite the honor♪
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Then we should get to training…… Oh, Trainer-san, 
you've been staring at me for a while, is something wrong?
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
choice_data_list: Don't push yourself too hard, ok?
Don't push yourself too hard, ok?

text_block_list.text:
Oh, that's right. 
I was so happy to be selected, that I couldn't help it.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text: Well then, I'll adjust my running, a little bit, accordingly.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, it's fine if you head home first. 
There's no issue if I do the adjustments on my own～
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
『A little bit』 is what Grass Wonder said but, she had originally 
refused scouts until she was satisfied with her own results.

Even if it was just a mock race, if she herself 
wanted to win, then she'd probably go too far…… 
thinking that, I went to check on her――
Haa…… Haa…… Haa…… Haa…… Haa……
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Huu…… 3 more laps…… 
But with a faster time……!
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
As I predicted, she was doing the same amount of 
training she would normally do before a race.

I know how strong her desire for victory is. At the very least, 
I would make sure she didn't push herself too hard. And then――

So fast!! 
Grass Wonder drives in on the straight!!
text_block_list.name: Announcer Uma Musume

text_block_list.text:
And just like that she stays in front! 
First place is Grass Wonder!
text_block_list.name: Announcer Uma Musume

text_block_list.text:
It was an overwhelming victory for Grass Wonder. 
And after that, the younger girls started gathering around her.
Onee～chan, you're so strooo～ng!
text_block_list.name: Uma Musume Girl A

text_block_list.text:
Onee～chan looks so kind, 
but she's almost like a "monster"～! Amaaaaazing～!
text_block_list.name: Uma Musume Girl B

text_block_list.text: Fufuu, a "monster", is it? I'm honored♪
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Oh, Trainer-san. 
Is there something on my face?
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
I'll cheer for you in the Twinkle Series too, so win! 
Monster Onee～chan!
text_block_list.name: Uma Musume Girl A

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I'll definitely win～. 
Once you grow up, you can run together with Onee-chan too.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Grass Wonder's desire to win was unfathomable. 
It was a mock race that reaffirmed how I needed to support her.
